text:
If an administrator wishes to enable UserDir only in specific vhost(s), it must be explicitly disabled in 
the main configuration section. Otherwise, it will default to 'public_html' and apply by inheritance to all 
vhosts in which it is not specifically disabled.

While this behaviour might not strictly speaking be a bug, it ought to be clearly documented.
creator: rici@ricilake.net
slive@apache.org
text:
Well, it is already documented as having a default setting of
UserDir public_html
in 2.0, and in 2.1 it will default to off.
